jobs_data.title: Blockchain Engineer (Go/Solidity)
jobs_data.description: Enertek have partnered with an exciting Web3 powerhouse behind one of the most advanced interoperable blockchain ecosystems and they are currently hiring across all teams in EMEA. 📌Key Responsibilities: -Design, develop, and deploy secure and efficient smart contracts using Solidity on Ethereum or compatible blockchains. -Optimize smart contract gas usage and ensure functionality through rigorous testing. -Build and maintain blockchain infrastructure using Golang, focusing on scalability, performance, and security. -Implement consensus mechanisms, peer-to-peer networking, and blockchain logic. -Integrate smart contracts with front-end and back-end applications. -Develop automated testing frameworks for blockchain and smart contracts (e.g., Truffle, Hardhat). -Identify and resolve vulnerabilities in smart contracts and blockchain systems. -Follow best practices for secure coding in Solidity and Golang. 📌Qualifications/Skills: -Strong experience in Golang for blockchain infrastructure or backend systems. -Expertise in Solidity for writing, testing, and deploying smart contracts. -In-depth understanding of blockchain architecture, consensus mechanisms, and distributed systems. -Experience with Ethereum, EVM-compatible chains, or other blockchain platforms like Polkadot or Binance Smart Chain. -Proficiency with blockchain development tools such as Truffle, Hardhat, Remix, and Web3.js/ethers.js. -Familiarity with debugging tools like Ganache and tools for security audits. If you are interested in the mentioned opportunity, please do send your updated CV to ryan@enertek-group.com and you will be contacted by a member of Enertek's team.

jobs_data.title: Senior Data Engineer (Bangkok based, relocation provided)
jobs_data.description:
About Agoda  

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

  Our Purpose –    Bridging the World Through Travel  

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodation, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 4,000+ talents coming from 90+ different nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enabling our customers to experience the world

  Get to Know Our Team  

The Data department oversees  all of  Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward.

  The Opportunity  

You might have a background as ‘ back end ’ or ‘data’ engineer , either way we are looking for smart engineers who can be super agile, move fast and have an eye for detail. We’d love to hear from you if you are skilled in any of the technologies we work with and excited at building new fintech technology.

In this Role, you will get to

      -Lead the team technically in improving scalability, stability, accuracy, speed and efficiency of our existing Data systems
-Build, administer and scale data processing pipelines
-Be comfortable navigating the following technology stack: Scala, Spark, java, Golang, Python3, scripting (Bash/Python), Hadoop, SQL, S3 etc
-Improve scalability, stability, accuracy, speed and efficiency of our existing data systems
-Design, build, test and deploy new libraries, frameworks or full systems for our core systems while keeping to the highest standards of testing and code quality
-Work with experienced engineers and product owners to identify and build tools to automate many large-scale data management / analysis tasks



What You’ll Need To Succeed

      -Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science /Information Systems/Engineering/related field
-5+ years of experience in software and data engineering
-Good experience in Apache Spark
-Expert level understanding of JVM and either Java or Scala
-Experience debugging and reasoning about production issues is desirable
-A good understanding of data architecture principles preferred
-Any other experience with Big Data technologies / tools
-SQL experience
-Analytical problem-solving capabilities & experience
-Systems administration skills in Linux



It’s great if you have

      -Good understanding of Hadoop ecosystems
-Experience working with Open-source products
-Python/Shell scripting skills
-Working in an agile environment using test driven methodologies

jobs_data.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer (GenAI Platform & Services)
jobs_data.description: WELCOME TO OLX At OLX, we work together to build a more sustainable world through trade. We make it safe, smart, and convenient to buy and sell cars, find housing, get jobs, buy and sell household goods, and more. Our colleagues around the world help to serve millions of people around the world every month, through its well-loved consumer brands including OLX, Otodom , Property24. Join OLX and see how far you can go. As part of our OLX business strategy, we are significantly increasing our investment in GenAI and ML technologies. We are planning to establish a GenAI center at our Barcelona hub, and we are looking for an experienced Senior Site Reliability Engineer to help us build a platform that enables widespread adoption of GenAI and to validate and develop reusable GenAI services and functionalities. This role can be based anywhere in Spain. You Will -Be a part of the OLX SRE Organization who provide support for the development team to ensure scalability, high-availability, deployment, and performance. -Educate and share responsibility within the organization in diagnosing, resolving, and proactively preventing production issues. -Automate as much as humanly possible and always configure as code. -Take operational responsibility for the services that we own, including taking part in an on-call rotation, practice balanced incident response and blameless postmortems. -Will be working in a team focussed on Generative AI. You Have -Experience with MLOps. -Proficiency in Python and possibly one or more modern programming languages: Java, Go, etc. -Understanding of containers and container orchestration, such as Kubernetes (EKS). -Proven hands-on experience of AWS. -Experience with Infrastructure as Code (e.g., Ansible, Terraform). -Experience with Gitlab and/or Jenkins pipelines as code. -Strong skills in fixing and debugging systems and networks. -Technical understanding and hands-on experience with performance, reliability, observability and incident management tools and methodologies. -Enthusiasm and initiative in embedding a DevOps mind-set into ways of working, implementing automation and tightening feedback loops. -Experience in problem solving deployment using software engineering principles. -Experience with monitoring and logging systems (ELK, Prometheus, Grafana). -Proficiency in developing and maintaining technical documentation and procedures. Good To Have -Hands-on experience with AWS Kinesis, SQS, Lambda (in particular in Python). -Hands-on experience with AWS Athena, EMR, Glue. -Hands-on experience with compliance with GDPR. Our Offer -Salary + annual bonus up to 15% of your annual salary. -Unique opportunity to become a part of an international team of top engineers learning from one another and contributing to the global OLX Group success. -Working with and impacting all classifieds websites in Europe, collaborating with European and other International Hubs. -Extraordinary place to learn and develop within fast growing, global classifieds leader which opens further career opportunities in diverse world of OLX and Prosus. -Work in a multicultural and international environment. We currently have 50+ nationalities! -Great Perks as a baseline, including 100% remote working (if you wish), opportunity to go for courses and conferences, etc. Why join OLX? At OLX, we invest in ourselves and each other to reach our full potential. We avoid bureaucracy and empower our teams to innovate; with opportunities, training, and leadership behaviors a key focus for all. Our commitment to inclusion ensures we listen to a diverse range of voices when making decisions. And, we combine the spirit and agility of a startup with our global scale and the backing of Prosus, one of the largest consumer internet groups in the world. Diversity, Equity and Inclusion at OLX At OLX, we are committed to creating a diverse, inclusive, and authentic workplace. We strongly encourage people of all races, ethnicities, disabilities, ages, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, religions, backgrounds, and experiences to apply. If you are excited about this role, and your past experiences do not align perfectly with every criteria asked for in the job description, we would still like you to apply. You may be just the right candidate for this or other opportunities across the business, and we'd like to hear from you. OLX (OLX consists of OLX Global B.V. and its affiliated companies) will handle your personal data with care and will process your personal data to assess your fit for the position you are applying for. You can give your consent (optional) to allow us to store your data for up to 12 months after the application process. So that in case you are not fit for the role at stake we can consider you for other suitable roles. Please refer to our Privacy Statement to find out more about how your application data will be processed.

jobs_data.title: Software Engineering Mastery Training and Internship Program
jobs_data.description: Software Engineering Mastery Internship & Training Program (M/F)Location: RemoteProgram Type: Hands-On Internship with In-Depth TrainingDuration: 3 MonthsCompensation: UnpaidLearn More: https://www.refontelearning.com/ Program Overview:Are you ready to elevate your software engineering skills and gain hands-on experience with the latest tools, technologies, and methodologies? The Software Engineering Mastery Internship & Training Program is designed to provide you with a comprehensive learning experience. This program covers all key aspects of modern software development—from system design and algorithms to full-stack development, agile practices, and DevOps principles. You’ll gain the skills and practical experience needed to succeed as a software engineer in today’s fast-evolving tech landscape. Program Objectives: -Master Software Engineering Foundations: Strengthen your understanding of core software engineering principles, including data structures, algorithms, system design, and software architecture, essential for building scalable and efficient software solutions. -Learn Full-Stack Development: Gain proficiency in both front-end and back-end development using in-demand technologies such as React, Node.js, Java, Python, SQL, and NoSQL databases like MongoDB. -Apply Modern Development Practices: Learn Agile, Scrum, and DevOps methodologies. Master tools and techniques like CI/CD pipelines to automate deployment and ensure seamless software delivery. -Hands-On Experience with Industry Tools: Use key tools for version control (Git), containerization (Docker), and cloud deployment (Kubernetes, AWS, Azure) to develop and manage end-to-end software solutions. -Practical Internship Exposure: Collaborate on real-world software projects, applying your knowledge to design, develop, test, and deploy high-impact applications that solve business problems. Skills You Will Acquire: -Full-Stack Development Mastery: Build dynamic web applications with React, Node.js, Java, Python, SQL, and MongoDB, covering all layers of web development from the front-end to the back-end. -Advanced Software Engineering Skills: Gain a strong foundation in data structures, algorithms, OOP (Object-Oriented Programming), and software architecture to build high-quality, maintainable code. -Agile & Project Management Expertise: Master Agile methodologies and use tools like Jira and Trello to efficiently manage projects and workflows in an agile team environment. -Version Control & Collaboration: Get hands-on experience with Git, GitHub, and GitLab to track and manage code changes, collaborate with teams, and contribute to open-source projects. -DevOps & CI/CD Knowledge: Learn the core principles of DevOps, including CI/CD pipelines, and implement automation for testing and deployment using cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Platform (GCP). -Containerization & Cloud Deployment: Understand Docker containerization and Kubernetes orchestration to streamline software deployment and improve scalability in cloud environments. -Problem-Solving & Debugging: Enhance your debugging and problem-solving abilities to efficiently tackle complex software challenges and improve the quality of your code. Who Should Apply: -Students and recent graduates who want to deepen their software engineering skills and master full-stack development, modern development practices, and DevOps methodologies. -Aspiring software engineers, full-stack developers, or backend developers looking to gain hands-on experience in the latest software technologies. -Professionals with a background in computer science, software engineering, or IT who are eager to advance their career with practical, real-world experience in software development. Why You Should Join: -Real-World Experience: Gain practical experience by working on live software engineering projects that showcase your abilities and prepare you for the demands of the tech industry. -Master Cutting-Edge Technologies: Learn to use the latest frameworks, tools, and platforms in full-stack development, cloud computing, and DevOps, keeping you ahead of the curve in the job market. -Boost Your Career: Software engineering is one of the most in-demand fields in the tech industry. Completing this program will open doors to opportunities as a Software Engineer, Full-Stack Developer, Backend Developer, or DevOps Engineer. -Expert Mentorship: Receive personalized guidance from experienced software engineers who will provide valuable insights into best practices, industry trends, and career development. How to Apply:Ready to take the next step in your software engineering career? Apply now for the Software Engineering Mastery Internship & Training Program and unlock new career opportunities in software development, system design, and DevOps. Learn More: https://www.refontelearning.com/

jobs_data.title: Full Stack Engineer Internship
jobs_data.description:
Full Stack Development Intern – European Economic Area | Refonte Learning
Are you passionate about coding, tech innovation, and the chance to make a meaningful impact on education? Join us at Refonte Learning as a Full Stack Development Intern, where you’ll be at the heart of transforming digital learning experiences!
Learn More:  https://www.refontelearning.com/
Job Title:  Full stack developer Intern
Location:  European Economic Area
About Refonte LearningRefonte Learning is an innovative educational technology company dedicated to reimagining how students learn across the globe. With our cutting-edge digital solutions, we create dynamic, accessible, and effective learning environments. Join our journey to revolutionize education, making it more engaging and effective.
Position OverviewWe are looking for a talented and motivated Full Stack Development Intern to join our team remotely within the European Economic Area (EEA). As a Full Stack Intern, you’ll work closely with our engineering team, contributing to both front-end and back-end projects. This role is ideal for someone eager to enhance their skills, build real-world applications, and work on impactful projects within a supportive, collaborative environment.
What You’ll Do- Develop and Enhance Features: Design, develop, and implement new features on our platform, focusing on creating smooth, responsive, and engaging user experiences.- Collaborate with Teams: Work cross-functionally with designers, developers, and product managers to bring ideas to life.- Debug & Optimise Code: Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks and bugs, ensuring high-quality software and an exceptional user experience.- Contribute to Code Reviews: Learn best practices through code reviews and actively contribute feedback on team projects.- Stay Updated: Keep up-to-date with the latest trends in technology and full stack development to drive innovation.
What We’re Looking For- Educational Background: Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.- Technical Skills: Knowledge of front-end frameworks (React, Angular, or Vue.js) and back-end technologies (Node.js, Python, or Ruby on Rails).- Database Experience: Familiarity with SQL and NoSQL databases.- Problem Solver: Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a can-do attitude.- Passion for Learning: Eager to take on new challenges and learn from experienced developers.- Good Communication: Ability to collaborate and communicate effectively in a team environment.
Why Join Refonte Learning?- Hands-on Experience: Work on real projects that have a direct impact on our users.- Mentorship & Growth: Gain practical skills with guidance from experienced engineers and regular feedback to support your development.- Flexible Work Environment: Enjoy a remote position that lets you work from anywhere within the EEA, providing flexibility and work-life balance.- Meaningful Work: Be part of an organization with a mission to make quality education accessible to all.
Application DetailsInterested? Ready to start your career with us? Apply now to make a difference in the world of education technology! Please submit your resume and a brief cover letter outlining your interest in this internship.
Note:This is an unpaid internship within Refonte Learning's Full Stack Development Program.Following your application our team will reach out with details about the onboarding process.
Learn More: https://www.refontelearning.com/---
Refonte Learning is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

jobs_data.title: AI Developer Training and Internship Program
jobs_data.description: AI Developer Training & Internship ProgramLocation: RemoteProgram Type: Unpaid Internship with Hands-On TrainingDuration: 3 MonthsLearn More: https://www.refontelearning.com/ Program Overview:Are you passionate about artificial intelligence and eager to become a skilled AI Developer? Our AI Developer Training & Internship Program offers an incredible opportunity to gain expertise in AI development, machine learning (ML), and deep learning (DL) while working on real-world projects. In this program, you will receive in-depth training in key AI concepts and frameworks, including TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Scikit-learn. You will also apply your knowledge in real-world scenarios, developing AI solutions that address real industry challenges. Whether you're looking to start a career as an AI Developer or enhance your existing skills, this program will help you get there. Program Objectives: -Master AI Development Foundations: Learn the core principles of artificial intelligence, including machine learning algorithms, deep learning networks, natural language processing (NLP), and computer vision (CV). -Practical AI Development: Gain hands-on experience developing, training, and deploying AI models using industry-leading tools and libraries like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Keras. -Data Science & AI Integration: Understand how to manage, clean, and preprocess large datasets, ensuring data readiness for model training and prediction tasks. -Model Optimization & Evaluation: Learn how to optimize AI models, tune hyperparameters, and evaluate model performance using metrics such as accuracy, precision, and recall. -Real-World AI Project Implementation: Collaborate with experienced developers to implement AI solutions on live projects, from conception to deployment. Skills You Will Gain: -Proficiency in AI frameworks such as TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch for building and deploying machine learning models. -Hands-on experience in data preprocessing, feature engineering, and working with large datasets to train and test AI models. -Knowledge of deep learning architectures like neural networks, CNNs (Convolutional Neural Networks), and RNNs (Recurrent Neural Networks). -Ability to create AI solutions for use cases like NLP, computer vision, predictive analytics, and more. -Cloud deployment skills: Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure for deploying AI models at scale. -Strong collaboration skills working within agile development teams to bring AI projects to life. Who Should Apply: -Students or recent graduates with a strong interest in AI, looking to kickstart their career in AI development. -Professionals with backgrounds in computer science, software engineering, or data science who want to transition into AI roles. -Anyone with a passion for AI technologies, data science, and working on innovative solutions to real-world problems using machine learning and artificial intelligence. Why Join This Program?: -Hands-On AI Development: Gain real-world experience developing AI solutions, preparing you for roles as an AI Developer, Machine Learning Engineer, or Data Scientist. -Cutting-Edge Technologies: Work with the latest AI frameworks and machine learning tools, such as TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch, that are in high demand in the tech industry. -Career Growth: The demand for AI developers is growing rapidly. Completing this internship will help you develop the skills and knowledge needed to excel in the field of AI and secure competitive job opportunities. -Expert Mentorship: Learn from experienced AI professionals who will guide you through complex projects, helping you refine your skills and advance your career in AI development. How to Apply:Are you ready to dive into the world of AI development? Apply now for the AI Developer Training & Internship Program to gain the expertise needed to build intelligent systems that are transforming industries across the globe. For more details and to apply, visit https://www.refontelearning.com/

jobs_data.title: Java Software Engineer (Remoto)
jobs_data.description: atSistemas ni cambia ni se transforma, ¡evoluciona a knowmad mood! 💪 Si en tus propósitos de año tienes apuntado el poder crecer profesionalmente en proyectos punteros y participar en entornos laborales donde la colaboración, la innovación y la diversión cobran protagonismo... ¡en knowmad mood podrás hacer check ✔️! A través de esta oportunidad participarás en un nuevo Squad de desarrollo con proyectos totalmente desde cero en un importante cliente del sector textil, como desarrollador/a o analista programador/a Java. ✔️ Trabajarás 100% remoto.✔️ Formarás parte de un nuevo Squad de desarrollo.✔️ Aportarás ideas en el equipo para implementar en los nuevos proyectos.✔️ Trabajarás con tecnologías punteras del mercado. Para hacer match....- Experiencia en versiones actualizadas de Java (preferiblemente Java 17/21)- Experiencia trabajando con microservicios y DDD/Hexagonal.- Experiencia con API First/OpenAPI- Experiencia trabajando con colas (Kafka preferible).- Experiencia con test unitarios, integración. Automatización de test.- Experiencia participando en proyectos desde cero. ¿Cuáles son nuestros propósitos para ti? ❤️ Apoyarte en tu crecimiento profesional-Evolution mood: tendrás a tu disposición procesos diseñados específicamente para tus funciones y objetivos de crecimiento dentro de la compañía, junto con nuestro mapa de carreras, una herramienta para diseñar tu plan de desarrollo profesional. -Formaciones: si bien quieres acceder a formaciones técnicas en habilidades o idiomas, tenemos a tu disposición certificaciones oficiales, Udemy Business, TechDays, Meetups, planes de formación... 🧡 Promover en conjunto la salud, el bienestar y ¡El buen ambiente! -Conciliación vida familiar y laboral: nos gusta que tengas equilibrio en tu vida personal y en tu carrera profesional, por lo que disfrutamos de 22 días de vacaciones + 2 días de libre disposición + 24 y 31 de diciembre, además de opciones de teletrabajo, horario flexible y jornada intensiva los viernes y en verano. -Quokka: promovemos el bienestar emocional, la actividad física, y la nutrición saludable mediante nuestro programa de actividades. -Actividades de Teambuilding: nos gusta divertirnos y estar en contacto con nuestros. -Friends mood: puedes ser Embajador de nuestra marca a través de nuestro Plan Amigo. -Club de ventajas: Programa de beneficios y descuentos (ocio, tecnología, bienestar...) -Kudos: fomentamos una cultura de feedback y reconocimiento :) 💛 Acordarnos de ti en tus momentos más especiales -Sorpresas: Tendrás alguna sorpresa asegurada durante el año (aniversario de trabajo, cumpleaños, nacimientos..). ¿Te gustaría ser partícipe de nuestra evolución?

jobs_data.title: AI & Data Engineering Training & Internship
jobs_data.description:
Refonte Infini is a leading IT corporation globally recognized for its expertise in providing top-notch IT and Ed-tech services. Specializing in Artificial intelligence (AI), digital marketing, data science, data analytics, UI-UX design, web development, and app development, we are dedicated to innovation, excellence, and empowering talents worldwide.
Job Title :  Data Engineer, Senior Data Engineer, Lead Data Engineer, Data Engineering Manager, Data Architect, Big Data Engineer, Cloud Data Engineer, ETL Developer, Data Engineer Consultant, Data Operations Engineer...
Job Summary:
Refonte Infini is seeking enthusiastic individuals who are looking to learn with us in the field of Data Engineering while working on live projects internationally. We are not just offering a flexible work environment but also offering to work with people in a global team all around from Oceania, Asia, Europe, & American continents.
Projects You Will Work On:
- Prompt Engineering- Gen AI- Data Warehousing- ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) Processes- Data Modelling and Database Management- Data Pipeline Development- Data Quality Assurance- Big Data Technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark)- Data Visualization
Roles & Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with our AI team to train our models with Prompt Engineering- Assist to develop Gen AI models- Contribute in the development of AI Foundations Models- Collaborate with experienced data engineering professionals and global team members.- Participate in designing and implementing data warehousing solutions.- Develop and maintain ETL processes to ensure efficient data flow.- Contribute to data modelling efforts for optimized database structures.- Assist in building and maintaining data pipelines for real-time and batch processing.- Conduct quality assurance checks to ensure data accuracy and consistency.- Explore and utilize big data technologies for scalable data processing.- Create visually appealing data visualizations to communicate insights effectively.
Qualifications:
- Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields, demonstrating a strong commitment to continuous learning and professional growth.- Proficient in programming languages such as Python, Java, or SQL.- Familiarity with database management systems (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL).- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with attention to detail.- Excellent written and verbal communication skills, essential for effective collaboration and conveying complex concepts.- Ability to work independently and as part of a team, showcasing adaptability and strong teamwork capabilities.
Note:
This position is unpaid. After submitting your application, our team will contact you to proceed with the application details and joining process.
Location:Remote: North America

Embark on this exciting journey and shape your future with us! 🚀
---

jobs_data.description: Job Title: AI, Data Science, DevOps, and Cloud Internship Location: Remote, European Union Company: Refonte AI Learn More On: https://refontelearning.com/ Launch Your Tech Career with Refonte AI’s AI, Data Science, DevOps, and Cloud Internship!Are you ready to dive into the transformative fields of AI, Data Science, DevOps, and Cloud Technology? jobs_data.title: Marketing WordPress Developer
jobs_data.description:
At  AutoDS, recently acquired by Fiverr, we're revolutionizing the eCommerce world by providing innovative tools that empower online sellers globally. As a fast-growing company, we’re looking for talented individuals who are passionate about technology, eCommerce, and making a real impact. If you're ready to join a dynamic team and thrive in a collaborative, fast-paced environment, we’d love to hear from you!AutoDS is looking for a  WordPress Developer  to join the Marketing Growth team!
Key Responsibilities:      -Develop and maintain WordPress websites  – ensure optimal performance, security, and seamless user experience across devices and browsers.
-Collaborate with the growth team  to implement A/B tests, improve page speed, and optimize for SEO.
-Assist with troubleshooting  – resolve bugs and address responsive design issues efficiently.
-Participate in team meetings and project management tasks  using Asana to stay aligned with development timelines.


Required Skills:      -Minimum 5 years of professional experience with WordPress development
-Strong knowledge of the WordPress stack  – PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, and MySQL.
-Experience with UI design tools  (e.g., Figma) and ability to implement pixel-perfect designs.
-Proficiency in WordPress theme and plugin development, including custom fields (ACF), custom post types, filters, and hooks.
-Familiarity with version control (Git)  – track changes and collaborate with the team efficiently.
-Troubleshooting and debugging  skills – expertise in diagnosing and resolving performance issues, plugin conflicts, and responsive design bugs.
-SEO knowledge  – understanding technical SEO principles and best practices for site structure, speed optimization, and schema.
-A/B testing knowledge  – experience with optimizing user experiences through data-driven testing and improvement strategies.
-Advantage: React knowledge
-Languages Required:  Proficient in English and Ukrainian.  


Soft Skills:      -Attention to detail  – a thorough approach to quality control and testing, ensuring high standards in development work.
-Problem-solving mindset  – a proactive, solution-focused approach to overcoming challenges.
-Effective communication  – strong interpersonal skills for collaborating with design, content, and marketing teams across a remote, multicultural environment.


Ready to take your career to the next level with  AutoDS? Join us and be part of a global team that’s driving the future of eCommerce innovation. Apply today and help us create cutting-edge solutions for online sellers worldwide!

jobs_data.title: Freelance C# Developer
jobs_data.description: At HAYS we are collaborating with an innovative IT company based in sunny Alicante, whose diverse product portfolio delivers Passenger Service technology for the travel industry across three channels: Desktop, Mobile and Self Service, from their Cloud Platform.They provide mission-critical products and services to several international aviation clients and their systems have handled over 50 million passengers for over 100 airlines in airports worldwide competing against billion-dollar companies using innovation. We are looking for a C# Developer Freelancer to be part of a core project in the IT team: What are the requirements for this position? -Minimum of 3 years of experience in C# development. -Experience with .NET technologies and building software for Windows/Linux. -Experience working in Windows and Linux environments. -Familiarity with version control systems such as Git. -Familiarity with automated support and monitoring tools is an advantage. -Experience with Active Directory and cloud platforms (Azure or AWS) are a plus. Which are the main tasks? -Develop, test, and maintain in-house applications and tools using C# and .NET. -Ensure compatibility across both Windows and Linux environments. -Work with stakeholders to gather requirements and deliver software solutions that enhance productivity and user experience. -Debug and resolve application issues, providing timely fixes and updates. -Participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices in software development. -Document code and development processes to ensure maintainability and facilitate knowledge transfer. -Communicate effectively with the team and other departments, both in English and Spanish. -Collaborate closely with Infrastructure, Development, and software support teams to deliver projects effectively. -Work under the ITIL Service Management Framework to ensure reliable and quality software delivery. -Support project delivery, providing technical expertise in software development phases. -Communicate effectively with users to understand and address their technical needs. -Provide training and guidance to colleagues to improve their knowledge and skills related to software tools and processes. What can we offer you? -Hybrid mode. -Office Location: Alicante -Integration in a project of a solid company with prospects for the future and with continuity. We are waiting for profiles like yours, passionate about technology and who want to face a new challenge. If this is your case, sign up for the offer with your CV so we can tell you more!

jobs_data.title: Full Stack Development Training and Internship Program
jobs_data.description: Program Title: Full Stack Development Training and Internship (M/F)Location: RemoteProgram Type: Training with Practical InternshipDuration: 3 monthsCompensation: Unpaid Learn More : https://www.refontelearning.com/ Program Overview:Our Full Stack Developer Training & Internship Program offers a structured, in-depth learning experience for those looking to gain expertise in both front-end and back-end development. As part of this program, you’ll receive formal training in the latest web development technologies and build real-world applications in collaboration with a cross-functional team. You will gain practical, hands-on experience working with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, while also learning how to deploy and maintain applications. Program Objectives: -Gain Full Stack Knowledge: Learn essential front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and back-end development tools (Node.js, Express) to build end-to-end web applications. -Master Web Frameworks: Develop proficiency in React.js and Vue.js for responsive front-end development, and use Node.js and Express for server-side programming. -Database Integration: Learn how to integrate and manage SQL and NoSQL databases like MongoDB and PostgreSQL to store and retrieve data. -Deployment and Hosting: Understand the process of deploying web applications using cloud platforms and web hosting services (AWS, Heroku). -Work on Real-World Projects: Apply your skills on live, industry-related projects, building full-stack applications and participating in all stages of development. Skills You Will Gain: -Expertise in front-end development using React.js, Vue.js, HTML, and CSS. -Proficiency in back-end technologies like Node.js, Express, and RESTful APIs. -Experience in database management, using both SQL and NoSQL solutions. -Knowledge of deployment tools (AWS, Heroku) and creating production-ready applications. -Familiarity with Agile methodologies, version control (Git), and CI/CD processes. -Strong problem-solving and debugging skills to optimize and maintain web applications. Target Audience: -College students or graduates pursuing careers in web development, software engineering, or full-stack development. -Tech professionals interested in expanding their knowledge in both front-end and back-end web development. -Aspiring developers who want to learn the latest web technologies and gain practical experience by building live applications. Why Choose Our Internship Program: -Learn By Doing: Gain hands-on experience with real-world projects and full-stack development tools. -Comprehensive Skillset: Learn both front-end and back-end technologies and become a well-rounded full-stack developer. -Career Readiness: Equip yourself with the skills needed to pursue positions like Full Stack Developer, Web Developer, and Software Engineer. -Supportive Learning Environment: Get mentorship from experienced developers and guidance on how to advance your career in web development. Learn More : https://www.refontelearning.com/

jobs_data.title: DevOps Engineering Training and Internship Program
jobs_data.description:
Program Title : DevOps Engineering Training and Internship (M/F)Location : RemoteProgram Type : Training with Practical InternshipDuration : 3 monthsCompensation : UnpaidLearn more : https://www.refontelearning.com/

Program Overview :Are you ready to dive into the world of DevOps and become an expert in automation, infrastructure management, and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD)? Our DevOps Engineering Training and Internship Program combines in-depth theoretical learning with practical experience in real-world projects, providing you with the tools and skills necessary to build efficient, scalable, and automated systems. This program is designed for individuals who want to master the latest DevOps practices and tools and play a key role in bridging the gap between development and operations teams.
Program Objectives :  - Master DevOps Tools and Technologies : Learn how to use essential DevOps tools such as Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform, AWS, Git, and CI/CD pipelines to automate deployment processes and manage infrastructure.- Understand Infrastructure as Code (IaC) : Gain hands-on experience with IaC tools to automate the provisioning and management of cloud resources in environments like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.- Automate Testing and Deployment : Learn how to implement automated testing and continuous deployment strategies to ensure that applications are quickly and reliably deployed across multiple environments.- Collaborate with Development Teams : Understand how to work closely with developers and IT teams to streamline development and deployment workflows, ensuring smoother collaboration between development and operations.- Real-World Internship Experience : Apply your knowledge in a practical internship, working on live DevOps projects, configuring automation tools, and building efficient deployment pipelines.
Skills You Will Gain :  - Proficiency in DevOps tools: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Git, and Terraform.- Experience in cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) for infrastructure management and deployment.- Knowledge of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with tools like Terraform and Ansible.- Automation of software testing and deployment through CI/CD pipelines.- Scripting skills for automation tasks (e.g., Bash, Python, Shell scripting).- Understanding of monitoring, logging, and performance tuning in a cloud-based infrastructure.- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and working in cross-functional teams.
Target Audience :- Students, recent graduates, or career changers with a keen interest in DevOps, cloud computing, and automation.- Individuals with a background in software development, IT, or systems engineering who want to transition into DevOps roles.- Anyone with basic knowledge of programming or systems administration who is eager to learn the core principles and tools of DevOps.
Why Join This Program ?  - Hands-on Experience : This program offers practical, real-world exposure to DevOps practices through an internship with live projects.- Cutting-Edge Technologies : Learn to use the latest tools and technologies in cloud computing, automation, and CI/CD pipelines, which are in high demand in the tech industry.- Career Opportunities : DevOps engineers are among the most sought-after professionals in IT. Upon completing this program, you will be well-prepared for a successful career in DevOps, cloud engineering, or automation.- Expert Mentorship : You will be guided by experienced DevOps professionals who will support your learning and development throughout the program.

Apply now to take the first step toward mastering DevOps engineering and accelerate your career in the rapidly growing field of cloud infrastructure and automation!

jobs_data.title: Digital Pricing Developer
Frontend Software Engineer (Remoto)
jobs_data.description:
Sobre nosotros

Somos el mayor ecommerce de tecnología de España. Empezamos en 2005 con una pequeña tienda en un pueblo de Murcia. Desde entonces hemos ido creciendo con recursos propios y siendo rentables hasta llegar a hoy. Nuestra plantilla supera los 600 empleados. Desarrollamos nuestra actividad omnicanal en España, Portugal, Francia, Italia y Alemania y contamos con tiendas físicas en Murcia, Madrid y Barcelona. Nuestro equipo remoto está distribuido por toda España.

Además de nuestra actividad ecommerce, tenemos otras líneas de negocio que también funcionan con nuestro software, como nuestro operador logístico, nuestra plataforma de servicios de marketing o nuestro producto de análisis de datos de mercado.

Pero todo esto es solo el principio. Lo que está por venir es mucho mejor.

Nos organizamos en equipos de producto autónomos y empoderados donde ingeniería, producto y diseño colaboran para construir algo grande. Y para ello necesitamos Frontend Software Engineers que nos ayuden a hacerlo posible.

Buscamos personas ambicionas, con experiencia en frontends complejos y que entiendan bien las bases de las tecnologías que usan para reforzar nuestros equipos de producto digital y reinventar la experiencia de venta online.

Nuestro stack actual en el frontend es TypeScript y React con Webpack como bundler, aunque si tienes mucha experiencia con otras librerías como Vue, no debería ser un problema.

¿Qué harás?

Resolverás problemas reales creando o mejorando productos digitales.

Crearás código simple, mantenible y eficiente y lo mejorarás de forma continua.

Te preocuparás constantemente de la experiencia del cliente y del impacto que el rendimiento de tu código tiene en ella. Los detalles te importan.

Tu trabajo será utilizado por millones de personas y habrá momentos clave donde esté sometido a picos de carga extremos. Te preocuparás de que lo resista.

Serás parte de un equipo de producto multidisciplinar en el que colaborarás con product managers, diseñadores y desarrolladores de distintas disciplinas.

Tomarás decisiones basadas en datos, respaldando siempre tus hipótesis con un análisis previo.

Serás dueño de tu trabajo durante todo el proceso, no únicamente al escribir el código.

Ayudarás a definir el rumbo de tu equipo, participando en las decisiones y planificaciones, asegurando la escalabilidad del mismo.

Te preocuparás por la experiencia de desarrollo, entendiendo que mejorarla es responsabilidad de todos.

Sobre ti

Juegas en equipo. Trabajas con humildad y tratas de aportar a tus compañeros.

Te importa el producto. No estás interesado en las soluciones meramente técnicas, sino que quieres conocer el problema que estás resolviendo y encontrar la mejor solución para el cliente, empatizando con sus necesidades.

Crees que la experiencia del cliente es fundamental. Tienes cierta sensibilidad visual.

Tienes experiencia demostrada desarrollando y operando frontends tipo SPA + SSR en entornos donde la escalabilidad y el rendimiento son clave.

Te apasiona resolver problemas y afrontar grandes retos, aportando soluciones de calidad y cuidando los pequeños detalles.

Sabes HTML, CSS y JavaScript/TypeScript. Te sientes cómodo con webpack o similar.

Tienes conocimientos sólidos de programación orientada a objetos, patrones de diseño de software y arquitectura de sistemas. Si tienes nociones de programación funcional, mejor.

Sabes escribir buenos tests… y también cuándo no hay que escribirlos. Puedes definir una buena estrategia de testing (unitarios, funcionales, integración y aceptación).

Asumes la responsabilidad de tu producto. Desde las fases más iniciales en las que estás definiendo la solución hasta la operación del servicio en producción.

Te gusta comunicar. Eres capaz de ordenar tus ideas y transmitir conceptos complejos de forma sencilla y eficaz.

Entiendes el valor de trabajar en una base de código que ya tiene unos años de vida y contribuyes a mejorarla de forma proactiva y continuada.

Nuestro Stack

Estas son muchas de las tecnologías con las que trabajamos. Te lo contamos para que puedas hacerte una idea, pero no esperamos que las conozcas todas ni tendrás que lidiar con todas ellas en tu día a día.

      -Frontend: NodeJS, TypeScript, React, Redux
-Backend: PHP 8, Symfony, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, Elasticsearch, RabbitMQ
-Infra: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Terraform, Datadog
-Data: Clickhouse, Kafka, DBT, Debezium.



¿Qué ofrecemos?

💻 Trabajo remoto.  Si estás en Murcia y te apetece, puedes usar la oficina a tu criterio.

💸 Banda salarial de entrada  48k€, 55k€ o 65k€ según nivel en el plan de carrera.

⌚  Horario flexible,  teniendo en cuenta los horarios de actuación del área y el resultado a entregar.

📈 Desarrollo personal.  Invertimos en formación general (para todo el equipo) y específica (para ti). Nuestro objetivo es que sigas creciendo.

🧑‍🤝‍🧑Retribución flexible  (cheque restaurante, formación, escuela infantil, seguro médico…).

🔖 Descuento en tus compras  en PcComponentes y otros comercios (viajes, consumo general, estilo de vida…).

🩺  ⚖️  🐕 Chat Médico, Legal & Veterinario Gratuito.  Nuestro servicio de chat te permite chatear con especialista en materia médica, legal y veterinaria las 24h del día en cualquier lugar del mundo.

🚴 Área de bienestar personal, podrás acceder a programas de ejercicios y salas de entrenamiento online; y planes de nutrición y alimentación saludable.

🧠  Programa de bienestar emocional. Donde podrás acceder a un servicio de atención psicológica online de manera gratuita y confidencial.

Y a todo esto súmale transparencia total en todos los pasos.Pinta bien, ¿verdad?Tenemos la seguridad de que ya sabes qué es lo que muchas empresas te ofrecen y por supuesto estamos a la altura:· Vas a contar con un  plan de carrera, crecimiento, proyección y desarrollo profesional personalizado· Tendrás acceso a  formación continua  para que puedas estar al día.· Podrás participar en  proyectos nacionales e internacionales  con opción a movilidad.· No todo va a ser trabajar, por eso disfrutar de la  tarjeta restaurante y seguro médico  nos parece esencial.
¡¡¡Teambuildings, afterworks y muchas más sorpresas!!

jobs_data.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs_data.description: THE CHALLENGE Eventbrite's business continues to grow and scale rapidly, powering millions of events. Event creators and attendees need to be empowered with new tools and technologies to assist them in having the most meaningful live experiences. Our technology spans across web, mobile, API, big data, machine learning, physical point of sale, and scanning systems. At Eventbrite Software Engineer roles are leveled on a scale from P1 to P6. The leveling applied is based upon skill sets, experience and training. P1 and P2 Engineers have the title “Software Engineer”, P3 Engineers have the title “Senior Software Engineer”, P4 Engineers have the title “Staff Engineer” and P5/P6 Engineers have the title “Principle”. THE TEAM We’ve got a culture focused on passion, kindness, continual learning, and feedback. We value collaborating and working together in small teams to solve big problems. We strive for complete team autonomy with full ownership of roadmaps and outcomes. Teams usually consist of front-end engineers, backend engineers, a product manager, a designer, and an engineering manager. We support an active culture of mentorship and inclusion and commit ourselves to learning new things daily. Pair programming, weekly demos, tech talks, and hackathons are at the core of how we’ve built our team and product. We believe in engaging with the community, regularly hosting free events with some of the top technical speakers, and actively contributing to open-source software. Team members follow an on-call rotation to ensure any issues are mitigated immediately and root causes are rectified. THE ROLE We seek Senior Software Engineers to join one of our development teams in Spain. You will build beautiful, scalable, robust, and secure platforms and user interfaces that people are excited to use every day. You will solve challenging problems and contribute to Eventbrite Engineering’s culture of technical excellence, inclusivity, and mentorship. This is more than an opportunity to join an amazing team, it is a chance to impact Eventbrite’s platform and organization at scale. THE TECH STACK Eventbrite is one of the world’s largest Django-powered sites by request volume. Python, Django, and MySQL are the primary off-the-shelf technologies in our stack. We are hosted on AWS. PySOA, our services framework builds on these core technologies. On the frontend, we make extensive use of React and Redux. However, the company is transitioning to a completely new stack (such as Kotlin, DynamoDB, Lambdas, gRPC, Step Functions, etc.) where each team will have complete ownership and autonomy. The Skillset -A passionate Senior Software Engineer with a knack for both frontend and backend development. We value versatility and appreciate the unique strengths that each individual brings to the table, whether you excel more in either area. We also believe that a diverse skill set leads to innovative solutions and fosters a collaborative work environment. -You have 4+ years of building applications to scale (see specific skill-set requirements below) -You are an efficient, practical programmer. -You have a record of designing and producing dependable code. -You are excited about working on a highly visible product. -You embrace the idea of making significant and visible contributions to business outcomes. -You care about making sure your code is maintainable and well-tested. -You have a holistic approach to quality. -You are a results-driven self-starter with great communication skills. -You have a track record of great collaboration skills, working closely with cross-functional partners from design, product, and/or data functions. -You are able to communicate with the appropriate level of context and granularity to customers, cross-functional partners, and stakeholders. -You enjoy teaching and mentoring colleagues. -You can work proficiently in English. Ideal Backend Skills -Must have: Programming languages such as Python, Java, Kotlin, Go, Rust, Ruby, etc. Web framework: Django, Symphony, Rails, ASP.net, etc. SQL database: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MSSQL, etc. -Bonus points: Experience with cloud services in AWS, Azure, or Google. Knowledge of microservices and/or Service Oriented Architecture. Experience working with modern frontend frameworks: React, Backbone/Marionette, etc. experience designing and developing APIs, both internal service and HTTP APIs. Ideal Frontend Skills -Must have: HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript with recent experience in ES6. Advanced knowledge of JavaScript and UI frameworks (e.g. Angular, React, and Redux). A Deep understanding of cross-browser compatibility pitfalls and how to work around them. -Bonus points: Previous experience with build chain tools like Gulp, Grunt, Webpack, and Yarn. Previous experience with visual design techniques like spacing, typography, and color. Familiarity with server-side frameworks such as Django, Express, Rails .Net or Node.js. Familiarity with container environments like Docker. Typescript skills. Familiarity with Jest, FE Unit/End-to-End Testing. Familiarity with continuous integration tools like Jenkins/ CircleCI. About Eventbrite At Eventbrite everyone is invited to be their whole self and we cultivate an environment to make sure that is feasible throughout the entirety of an individual's time at Eventbrite. We are committed to providing competitive, valuable and meaningful benefits and experiences for our employees to ensure we meet them where they are in life. Cultivating a diverse, equitable and inclusive culture where all people are invited and belong is our top priority. Employees can participate in resource groups and we offer global programming and training throughout the year to support a diverse and inclusive workplace. Read more about our Diversity and Inclusion work for our team, culture, and community. Benefits We offer comprehensive benefits and a wellness package above and beyond standard medical benefits to support our Britelings’ lifestyle. Eventbrite's global benefit programs are designed to meet you where you are by offering resources and support for your health, well-being, finances, and family. This includes support in a remote environment, wellness allowance, Carrot family planning benefit, Origin Financial Planning service, and other offerings to ease the mind and body like Modern Health and BriteBreaks (generally the first Friday of every month off). EQUAL OPPORTUNITY At Eventbrite, we are dedicated to fostering diversity, equity and inclusion. We welcome individuals from all backgrounds, abilities and experiences to apply, and we make employment decisions on the basis of merit. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, national origin, religion or religious creed, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender reassignment, gender expression, age, marital status, status as a protected veteran, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information or characteristics, or any other legally protected characteristic. If, due to a disability, you need an accommodation during any part of the interview process, please let your recruiter know.

jobs_data.title: Backend Software Engineer (Remoto)
jobs_data.description:
Sobre nosotros

Somos el mayor ecommerce de tecnología de España. Empezamos en 2005 con una pequeña tienda en un pueblo de Murcia. Desde entonces hemos ido creciendo con recursos propios y siendo rentables hasta llegar a hoy. Nuestra plantilla supera los 600 empleados. Desarrollamos nuestra actividad omnicanal en España, Portugal, Francia, Italia y Alemania y contamos con tiendas físicas en Murcia, Madrid y Barcelona. Nuestro equipo remoto está distribuido por toda España.

Además de nuestra actividad ecommerce, tenemos otras líneas de negocio que también funcionan con nuestro software, como nuestro operador logístico, nuestra plataforma de servicios de marketing o nuestro producto de análisis de datos de mercado.

Pero todo esto es solo el principio. Lo que está por venir es mucho mejor.

Nos organizamos en equipos de producto autónomos y empoderados donde ingeniería, producto y diseño colaboran para construir algo grande. Y para ello necesitamos Frontend Software Engineers que nos ayuden a hacerlo posible.

Buscamos personas ambicionas, con experiencia en frontends complejos y que entiendan bien las bases de las tecnologías que usan para reforzar nuestros equipos de producto digital y reinventar la experiencia de venta online.

Aunque nuestro stack actual es PHP 8, eso no debe ser un problema. Sabemos que lo fundamental es entender los conceptos y las bases, el lenguaje o el framework lo podrás aprender rápido.

¿Qué harás?

Resolverás problemas reales creando o mejorando productos digitales.

Crearás código simple, mantenible y eficiente y lo mejorarás de forma continua.

Te preocuparás constantemente de la experiencia del cliente y del impacto que el rendimiento de tu código tiene en ella. Los detalles te importan.

Tu trabajo será utilizado por millones de personas y habrá momentos clave donde esté sometido a picos de carga extremos. Te preocuparás de que lo resista.

Serás parte de un equipo de producto multidisciplinar en el que colaborarás con product managers, diseñadores y desarrolladores de distintas disciplinas.

Tomarás decisiones basadas en datos, respaldando siempre tus hipótesis con un análisis previo.

Serás dueño de tu trabajo durante todo el proceso, no únicamente al escribir el código.

Ayudarás a definir el rumbo de tu equipo, participando en las decisiones y planificaciones, asegurando la escalabilidad del mismo.

Te preocuparás por la experiencia de desarrollo, entendiendo que mejorarla es responsabilidad de todos.

Sobre ti

Juegas en equipo. Trabajas con humildad y tratas de aportar a tus compañeros.

Te importa el producto. No estás interesado en las soluciones meramente técnicas, sino que quieres conocer el problema que estás resolviendo y encontrar la mejor solución para el cliente, empatizando con sus necesidades.

Crees que la experiencia del cliente es fundamental.

Tienes experiencia demostrada desarrollando y operando software en entornos donde la escalabilidad y el rendimiento son clave.

Te apasiona resolver problemas y afrontar grandes retos, aportando soluciones de calidad y cuidando los pequeños detalles.

Tienes conocimientos sólidos de programación orientada a objetos, patrones de diseño de software, arquitectura de sistemas, código limpio y arquitectura hexagonal.

Sabes escribir buenos tests… y también cuándo no hay que escribirlos. Puedes definir una buena estrategia de testing (unitarios, funcionales, integración y aceptación).

Entiendes cómo funcionan los diferentes sistemas de almacenamiento de datos y sabes cuándo elegir cada uno (clave-valor, relacional, documental…).

Asumes la responsabilidad de tu producto. Desde las fases más iniciales en las que estás definiendo la solución hasta la operación del servicio en producción.

Te gusta comunicar. Eres capaz de ordenar tus ideas y transmitir conceptos complejos de forma sencilla y eficaz.

Nuestro Stack

Estas son muchas de las tecnologías con las que trabajamos. Te lo contamos para que puedas hacerte una idea, pero no esperamos que las conozcas todas ni tendrás que lidiar con todas ellas en tu día a día.

      -Frontend: NodeJS, TypeScript, React, Redux
-Backend: PHP 8, Symfony, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, Elasticsearch, RabbitMQ
-Infra: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Terraform, Datadog
-Data: Clickhouse, Kafka, DBT, Debezium



¿Qué ofrecemos?

💻 Trabajo remoto.  Si estás en Murcia y te apetece, puedes usar la oficina a tu criterio.

💸 Banda salarial de entrada  48k€, 55k€ o 65k€ según nivel en el plan de carrera.

⌚  Horario flexible,  teniendo en cuenta los horarios de actuación del área y el resultado a entregar.

📈 Desarrollo personal.  Invertimos en formación general (para todo el equipo) y específica (para ti). Nuestro objetivo es que sigas creciendo.

🧑‍🤝‍🧑Retribución flexible  (cheque restaurante, formación, escuela infantil, seguro médico…).

🔖 Descuento en tus compras  en PcComponentes y otros comercios (viajes, consumo general, estilo de vida…).

🩺  ⚖️  🐕 Chat Médico, Legal & Veterinario Gratuito.  Nuestro servicio de chat te permite chatear con especialista en materia médica, legal y veterinaria las 24h del día en cualquier lugar del mundo.

🚴 Área de bienestar personal, podrás acceder a programas de ejercicios y salas de entrenamiento online; y planes de nutrición y alimentación saludable.

🧠  Programa de bienestar emocional. Donde podrás acceder a un servicio de atención psicológica online de manera gratuita y confidencial.

Disponemos de 100% teletrabajo, flexibilidad horaria, jornada intensiva los viernes y meses de verano y mejoramos tus vacaciones por cada año que pases con nosotros/as. -Tendrás acceso a formación continua y planes de carrera personalizados. jobs_data.title: Senior Frontend Developer
jobs_data.description:
Are you excited about shaping the future of sports betting technology? Join the Sportsbook team and contribute to our in-house Sportsbook platform that hosts multiple brands. Our sophisticated system leverages Java for robust development, Kafka for real-time data streaming, and Spring Boot for creating powerful services. You’ll work with various live sports feed integrations and utilise RabbitMQ for efficient message handling.

Our platform is engineered for high performance, ensuring high availability and scalability to handle high throughput and peak loads. We also prioritise rigorous performance testing to maintain superior reliability and speed.

If you’re passionate about cutting-edge technology and want to make a significant impact in the sports betting industry, we want to hear from you!"

When it comes to being successful at Sportserve, there's more to it than just being really good at the technical stuff. It's also your ability to be an awesome problem solver. And here's the thing, we totally get that we can't all be experts in everything, right? So, it's all about having that thirst for knowledge and being passionate about learning. You'll also need amazing attention to detail, so if something seems off, you won't rest until you've figured out what's going on. We see ourselves as a cool group of people who love coming up with new ideas and making things happen. As long as you have a true passion for creating awesome stuff, you'll fit right in.

What you'll be getting up to:  

We are looking for someone to work closely with our product owners to help shape and build the future of our tools and products.

You'd spend your time developing and improving existing projects, for example:

      -  Building new websites and pages based on provided technical and functional specifications.
-  Implementing different strategies for existing products and tools based on requirements.



We'd also do a ton of work together like:

      -  Architecting and developing new features.
-  Prototyping and evaluating potential implementations.



You would spend a lot of time programming, brainstorming on hard problems, and prototyping different ideas. You wouldn't be just churning through tickets in the backlog — you'd be helping to design entirely new products, figuring out what exactly we're even building and why.

While being a somewhat big company, we're split into small teams which means that even though we each have our areas of expertise, we all wear many hats. We're looking for a programmer, but you'd also help out with things like:

      -  Managing Git VCS issues and fixing bugs.
-  Writing and improving the documentation for the products and tools we make.
-  Helping customer support answer customer questions.
-  Troubleshooting problems during live communication with other teams



If you've ever maintained a large project, working with us carries a lot of the same responsibilities.

Here are a few recent projects you might have worked on if you were already part of the team:

      -  Building next version of our products from scratch with latest technologies.
-  Building a performance testing architecture and laying the groundwork that will be used company-wide.
-  Refactoring the actual production application to simplify and speed up performance without any down-time.



Key Responsibilities:

      -Develop websites based on technical and functional specifications provided by the client;  
-Continued maintenance, development, and bug fixes for the existing web sites;  
-Utilise source control tools such as Gitlab for maintaining code versioning and releases;  
-Test the website on different browsers and identify any technical problems;  
-Work with the team to manage, optimise and customise multiple web applications;  
-  Attend daily meetings to report on assigned tasks’ progress and attend fortnightly meetings for project planning and other meetings from time to time;  
-Complete tasks & deliver projects on-time and to the highest standards;  
-Contribute ideas for making the application better and easier to use.
-Comfortable working on-call.



Required Qualifications:

      -At least 5 years of professional experience as a Frontend Web Developer, with a proven track record of successful projects and leadership in a senior capacity.  
-Expert proficiency in React.js and its core principles, with demonstrated experience in architecting complex applications.  
-Extensive experience designing and implementing scalable solutions using popular React.js workflows (such as Redux, Flux, or MobX), with a focus on performance optimization and code maintainability.  
-Comprehensive knowledge of web technologies including HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, with a deep understanding of best practices and emerging trends in frontend development.  
-Mastery of modern frontend build pipelines and tools (e.g., Webpack), including the ability to configure and optimise build processes for large-scale applications.  
-Proven expertise in designing and consuming RESTful APIs, with a strong emphasis on efficient data handling and integration.  
-Advanced understanding of version control systems (e.g., Git) and code collaboration tools (e.g., GitHub), with experience in leading code reviews and providing mentorship to junior developers.  
-Demonstrated proficiency in ensuring cross-browser compatibility and implementing responsive design techniques, with a focus on delivering consistent user experiences across different devices and platforms.  
-Exceptional ability to write clean, modular, and well-documented code, with a keen eye for detail and a commitment to writing maintainable software.  
-Proven track record of solving complex technical challenges and troubleshooting issues in production environments, with a systematic approach to problem-solving and a focus on root cause analysis.
